name: Fission-like, windows-style progress bar for S4E
description:
The progress bar was removed in Firefox 4 beta8pre so to get it back you need to install "status-4-evar" add-on here: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/235283/
This style makes the progress bar wide, looking like fission add-on was. It also adds a nice green (windows vista/7 like if you're using one of these two) style to it.

Credits to foxxyn8 for the help!

Updates: 
10/12/2010 - Removed the ugly grey lines on the top and bottom of progress-bar.
02/13/2011 - Fixed the style for 2011.01.17.02.3 version of Status-4-Evar.
02/24/2011 - Added the fix for "wider URL-bar" bug in the latest beta versions of S4E.
03/19/2011 - Updated the style for 2011.03.16.22 version of Status-4-Evar.
08/20/2011 - Updated for Firefox 6.
